explains: n. 剩余部分，其余；廉价出售的书，滞销图书；差数，余数；<法律>有待继承产权，指定继承产权
wordGroup: for the remainder of 余下的岁月里
chinese remainder theorem 孙子剩余定理

sentences.en: He gulped down the remainder of his coffee.
sentences.cn: 他一口喝完了剩下的咖啡。

sentences.en: His widow became a virtual recluse for the remainder of her life.
sentences.cn: 他的遗孀在其余生成了一名实际上的隐居者。

sentences.en: Only 5.9 percent of the area is now covered in trees. Most of the remainder is farmland.
sentences.cn: 该地区现在的树木覆盖率仅为5.9％。剩余部分大多是农田。
